rooms.name: Entrance Lobby
rooms.description: Wheelchair accessible entrance with low threshold and automatic doors. Vastu compliant positioning to welcome positive energy.

rooms.name: Living Area & Open-Plan Kitchen
rooms.description: Open-plan space featuring floor-to-ceiling windows for natural lighting. Integrated kitchen area with modern appliances and wheelchair accessible layout.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living area. Vastu principles suggest alignment with the east direction for dining.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: Dedicated home office with ample natural light and privacy, positioned in a quiet corner to enhance focus. Accessible layout with adjustable furniture.

rooms.name: Guest Bathroom
rooms.description: Wheelchair accessible guest bathroom featuring grab bars and sufficient space for maneuverability.

rooms.name: Storage & Utility Area
rooms.description: Located near the entrance to facilitate smooth movement of goods. Vastu-compliant storage to avoid clutter in living spaces.

openings.description: Automatic door with wheelchair accessibility features.
Floor-to-ceiling windows providing ample natural light and ventilation in accordance with Vastu principles.
Accessible door to ensure smooth wheelchair movement.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom Suite
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with en-suite bathroom designed for relaxation and privacy. Vastu alignment emphasizes east or north directions.

rooms.name: ensuite Bathroom
rooms.description: Wheelchair accessible bathroom integrated within the Master Bedroom Suite for convenience.

rooms.name: Secondary Bedroom 1
rooms.description: Cozy bedroom ensuring ample personal space. Vastu recommendations include placing it in a north or west direction.

rooms.name: Secondary Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Additional bedroom for guests with wheelchair accessible design features and natural lighting.

rooms.name: Study / Hobby Room
rooms.description: Versatile space that can serve as a study or hobby area. Designed to maximize light and Vastu positive energy.

openings.location: Connecting Ground Floor and First Floor
openings.description: Wheelchair accessible staircase with a companion ramp to ensure full accessibility. Vastu-compliant placement for smooth energy flow.
